create_lobby_desc: Create a game lobby. Input the name for the lobby and if it'll be joinable upon creation (you can change everything later).
leave_lobby_desc: Are you sure that you want to leave the lobby?
chat_info_msg: Please note that no chat messages are stored, don't annotate stuff in chat because it WILL be lost
kicked: You were kicked out of the lobby
party_is_selected_by: The party <PARTY> is currently selected by <PLAYER>
cfg_global_joinable_desc: If the lobby can be joined
cfg_global_turn_timeout_seconds_desc: Max time allowed per turn per player
troops_per_turn_default: Half of the territory count (rounded down)
cfg_immutable: This server has defined its default game config as immutable. You can still see the values below, but you're not able to modify them. (Except for the joinable property)
cfg_anarchism_passive_unoccupied_country: Number of random unoccupied countries that will fall into anarchism per round
cfg_anarchism_bonus_troops_each_turns_en: Number of troops that anarchism will gain after ending its turn. (Will be assigned at random)
cfg_anarchism_bonus_attack_success_bonus: Maximum number of times the attack success bonus can be stacked
cfg_anarchism_bonus_number_of_successful: Number of successful attacks to pressure
Number of required successful sequential attacks to put victims into pressure
cfg_anarchism_su_black_block_number_of_l: Number of lost territories required to spawn
The Black Block will be spawned after Anarchism loses this amount of territories
cfg_anarchism_su_black_block_hp_recovery: The amount of HP the Black Block will regenerate after having success in an attack
cfg_feudalism_bonus_troop_bonus_on_conqu: Number of troops that Feudalism will gain after conquering a territory
cfg_feudalism_su_dragon_cooldown_desc: Number of turns before the dragon spawns again.
cfg_feudalism_su_dragon_hp_increase_rate: Amount of max HP increase per turn until the Dragon's Max HP is what is configured
cfg_feudalism_su_dragon_hp_recovery_desc: The amount of HP the Dragon will regenerate per turn when on a walled territory
cfg_feudalism_sa_wall_max_desc: Max number of walled territories that the Feudalism can have
cfg_feudalism_sa_wall_rolls_to_break_des: Required number of sequential max-value attacking rolls to break the wall
cfg_socialism_passive_min_troops: Min troop movement size to allow unlimited movement
cfg_socialism_passive_min_troops_desc: Minimum number of troops moving at once to allow for unlimited movement through allied territory
cfg_socialism_bonus_dice_advantage_desc: Dice modifier when attacking or defending with numerical disadvantage
cfg_socialism_debuff_famine_start_desc: Number of troops required for Famine to start killing troops.
cfg_socialism_debuff_famine_units: Famine: Units to die per turn
cfg_socialism_debuff_famine_units_desc: Units that'll die per turn if the number of troops exceeds the starting point
cfg_socialism_su_stalin_gulag_rate_desc: Troops that can be converted to the red army per turn
cfg_socialism_su_morus_turns_island: Turns in Cuba to spawn the Utopia Island
cfg_socialism_su_morus_turns_island_desc: Required number of turns in Cuba to spawn the Utopia Island
cfg_socialism_su_wilson_seq_length_desc: Required number of sequential numerical rolls (starting from 1) to evolve into The Red God
cfg_socialism_sa_tsar_cast_desc: Turns to cast the Tsar Bomb
cfg_socialism_sa_tsar_famine_desc: Famine penalty multiplier while casting the Tsar Bomb
cfg_socialism_sa_tsar_radiation_desc: Number of turns for the Tsar Bomb radiation to completely decay
cfg_socialism_sa_utopia_island_troops_de: Number of new troops that will be granted per turn while the Utopia Island is active
cfg_capitalism_pa_troop_gain_desc: Number of troops gained with each territory trade
cfg_capitalism_db_crisis_seq_desc: Number of sequential loses to initiate a crisis
cfg_capitalism_db_crisis_duration_desc: Turns that the capitalist territories will be in crisis
cfg_capitalism_su_keynes_multiplier_desc: John Keynes territory troop multiplication factor
cfg_capitalism_su_croc_cooldown_desc: Cooldown to force some party to sell a country for 1 troop
cfg_capitalism_su_zuck_rate_desc: Number of troops that will be converted per turn
cfg_capitalism_su_zuck_cooldown: Cooldown to create a social network
cfg_capitalism_su_zuck_cooldown_desc: Cooldown to create a social network in another country
cfg_capitalism_su_jobs_rate_desc: Number of troops that will be invalidated per turn
cfg_capitalism_su_jobs_cooldown_desc: Cooldown to create another Store in a new territory
cfg_capitalism_su_trump_bonus_desc: Territory defense modifier when Trump is in the territory
cfg_capitalism_sa_privatization_allow_sp: Allow control of special units in privatized territories
